messages.content: As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name: '. I will derive this data from the following paragraph: Investigator Lewis and Chauffer Rodney Robinson found a casing at 12:31am. Technician Muhammad collected the casing, later identified as a 'Win' 9mm Luger. Sergeant McMullen briefed Detective Morton about a blood trail leading to North Derbignay Street. Detective Aucoin secured the residence post-investigation. Crime Lab Technician Rogers conducted tests on Commodore and Taylor. Detective Trehan's records from the Coroner's Office classified the deaths as homicides. Detective Morton met with Darceleen Commodore regarding Reynell Payne's coercion attempt. Detective Pratt from Homicide handled a scene on Mazant Street. Detective Sergeant Chris Robert, Officer Juan Lopez, Officers Phil Burras & Quincy Broaden, Officers Nate Addison & Glen Hewitt, Detective Gregory Johnson, Detective Jason McGee, Detective Ananie Mitchell, and Detective Melvin McCullum are all mentioned in connection with various units and investigative activities. Scientific Criminal Investigations Division Officer Gary Sallienger and Orleans Parish Coroner's Office Investigator Parnell Williams were also involved in the investigation.
Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.

Officer Name: Investigator LewisOfficer Context: Assisted in finding a casing at the crime scene at 12:31am.Officer Role: InvestigatorOfficer Name: Chauffer Rodney RobinsonOfficer Context: Helped in moving the decedent and found a casing at the crime scene.Officer Role: ChaufferOfficer Name: Technician MuhammadOfficer Context: Collected a casing identified as a 'Win' 9mm Luger at the crime scene.Officer Role: TechnicianOfficer Name: Sergeant McMullenOfficer Context: Briefed Detective Morton about a blood trail leading to North Derbignay Street.Officer Role: SergeantOfficer Name: Detective MortonOfficer Context: Led the investigation; met with Darceleen Commodore regarding coercion by Reynell Payne.Officer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Detective AucoinOfficer Context: Secured the residence post-investigation.Officer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Crime Lab Technician Tamika RogersOfficer Context: Conducted gunshot residue tests on Commodore and Taylor.Officer Role: Crime Lab TechnicianOfficer Name: Detective David TrehanOfficer Context: Records from the Coroner's Office classified the deaths as homicides.Officer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Detective PrattOfficer Context: Handled a scene on Mazant Street.Officer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Detective Sergeant Chris RobertOfficer Context: Mentioned in connection with investigative activities.Officer Role: Detective SergeantOfficer Name: Officer Juan LopezOfficer Context: Mentioned as part of a unit.Officer Role: OfficerOfficer Name: Officers Phil Burras & Quincy BroadenOfficer Context: Mentioned as part of a unit.Officer Role: OfficersOfficer Name: Officers Nate Addison & Glen HewittOfficer Context: Mentioned as part of a unit.Officer Role: OfficersOfficer Name: Detective Gregory JohnsonOfficer Context: Mentioned as part of a unit.Officer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Detective Jason McGeeOfficer Context: Mentioned as part of a unit.Officer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Detective Ananie MitchellOfficer Context: Mentioned as part of a unit.Officer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Detective Melvin McCullumOfficer Context: Mentioned as part of a unit.Officer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Officer Gary SalliengerOfficer Context: Part of the Scientific Criminal Investigations Division, involved in the crime scene sketch.Officer Role: OfficerOfficer Name: Investigator Parnell WilliamsOfficer Context: From the Orleans Parish Coroner's Office, involved in the investigation.Officer Role: Investigator
